content:
Coffee is a great way to cap off your shopping trip!

As a digital AI assistant, I don't have real-time access to specific store promotions or deals. However, I can suggest a few ways to find out if there are any deals or promotions at Starbucks this week:

1. Check the Starbucks website or mobile app: You can visit the Starbucks website or open their mobile app to see if they have any promotions or offers listed.
2. Sign up for Starbucks Rewards email updates: If you're a Starbucks Rewards member, make sure you're signed up to receive email updates from them. They often send out exclusive offers and promotions to their loyalty program members.
3. Follow Starbucks on social media: Starbucks often posts about their promotions and deals on their social media channels, such as Twitter or Facebook.
4. Look for digital coupons or offers: You can also check coupon apps like RetailMeNot or Coupons.com to see if they have any Starbucks offers or discounts available.

As for earning more stars on your Starbucks Rewards card, make sure to scan your card or mobile app every time you make a purchase, and take advantage of any bonus star opportunities they offer. You can also consider purchasing items that offer extra stars, like certain drinks or food items.

I hope that helps, and happy coffee shopping!
